definitions.definition: A putative, secret organization of individuals gathered for a political purpose.
examples: The cabal is plotting to ruin the world.
The cabal to destroy the building was foiled by federal agents.

definitions.definition: An identifiable group within the tradition of Discordianism .

main_definition: ( derogatory ) A putative, secret organization of individuals gathered for a political purpose.
secondary_definitions: An identifiable group within the tradition of Discordianism .
